oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Family record page of Robinson family Bible
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Robinson family lived in the "Narrows," near Falling Water in Dekalb County, Tennessee. This page from the family Bible contains the names of some children who died and were not recorded in the census. See warr011 for letter from J. D. Robinson to Miss Hayes when he was courting her during the war and and 020 for tintype of the married Mrs. Robinson.
